import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent { searchResults = ['VNAirline', 'VietJet', 'Bamboo']; }
